sources.title: White Night | Full Romance Drama
sources.description:
**This film is under non-exclusive license from Glass House Distribution. All rights reserved**

White Night - Set in the sleepless night of Nuit Blanche, White Night follows five different stories of people as they weave their way through various art installations tackling the issues of, love, losses, and the inevitability of getting old.

2017
Stars: Jonathan Keltz, Sara Mitich, Natalie Brown

Welcome to Movie Central. Subscribe and watch more Awesome Movies.

metadata.Plot: A pawnbroker is found murdered in a remote town. Police suspect that he was murdered by an acquaintance, as even the most experienced investigator on the case could identify no signs of resistance. Three people come under suspicio...
metadata.Writer: Keigo Higashino, Yeon-seon Park, Park Shin-woo
metadata.Actors: Han Suk-kyu, Son Ye-jin, Go Soo
